text: Place the diced onions into the pan with melted butter. Sauté until the onions become transparent. Pour in the canned diced tomatoes and the chicken or vegetable base. Mix in well. Add the tomato juice and sugar. Stir through. Add the salt and pepper to taste. Raise the heat to near boiling. Once at this point, remove from the heat. Pour in the sherry and cream. Stir through. Add the parsley and basil. While optional, these add a distinctive freshness and lift to the soup. Taste and adjust seasonings if needed. Serve. Add a drizzle of yogurt, or grated cheese, or fresh herbs as a garnish. This soup goes well with warm crusty bread or toasted quesadillas.
